Super-Suiki?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Breeding/Combining: Super-Suiki?
By Kurasu Soratubo on Thursday, May 11, 2000 - 02:28 pm:

Not having tried this, I wanna send the question out to the board: has anyone ever used a Sueki Suezo in combining with anything except another Sueki? Is there any chance of the stats being carried over? As in, a Sueki Suezo + A Worm of some sort. Both of them are life creatures. Will the combination be a good one, and the life get carried over?

If no one's tried this yet, I may set up a weekend to test it and see. Might shine a light on the 'combining' question. Or at least whether age has anyting to do with it.

By torey_luvullo on Thursday, May 11, 2000 - 03:53 pm:

early on, my formula for getting a slightly better monster was always to combine with ol sueki. it never was a good combo according to dadge, but because sueki"s stats were so high, and because i didn't have a lot of big statted monsters, it always gave me better stats in the offspring.

By Foster on Tuesday, August 1, 2000 - 10:43 pm:

Ok, this is an old post I am re-opening,....
does the lifespan of a combination with a sueki have an effect of it only having a one week lifespan, or would it simply be considered a suezo to the game's inner brain??

so if I combined it with something else, would the life be considerably lower?? or just average to that of any other combination with a Suezo????

Thanks for any input

By torey_luvullo on Wednesday, August 2, 2000 - 04:42 am:

i remember a very old thread from b campbell to the effect that one of his first succesful monsters was a suezo born of the combination of two suekis. i think it was fatmanized in one of the incidents, tho.

early on in my raising career, when i had trouble getting good starting monsters, i combined a slated vanity with a sueki. the resulting pixie had [what was then considered by me to be] a normal lifespan.

By Farmer Jimbo on Wednesday, August 2, 2000 - 08:56 am:

First of all, the Sueki's short lifespan has NO effect on the resulting combined monster. I've tried this a couple of times and it just doesn't carry over (Yeah!). Secondly, it would be my humble suggestion that you try combining your good HOF'ers with a Sueki and see what Dadge says. I was able to get an incredible pure Suezo by combining a pure HOF Mock with a Sueki and a crab claw. The resulting monster is still frozen at month one, but he already has 1800 combined point total and 5 unlocked techs!

Bottom line, always keep a Sueki or two in your freezer for combining experiments and heel badge tourneys.
